Düşük bütçe ve sistem dostu bir oyun. Arkadaşlarınız yada Ruslar ile beraber takılabileceğiniz bir oyun. İndirimde alabileceğiniz mükemmel bir oyun. Mekanik bakımında oldukça yeterli ve grafik konusunda fiyatını hak eden bir güzelliği var. Oldukça güzel ve saatler harcayabileceğiniz bir oyun.

In my opinion, Counter Strike Source is the best Counter Strike from the whole franchise. Why? Here is why.

Graphically Source engine makes his job at it's finest, with the ragdoll physics, better visuals than in 1.6 and/or Condition Zero and the amount of effort in the scenarios are a proof that Valve knows how to make a game clean.

Gameplay is really well done. HUD looks similar to 1.6 and Condition Zero, but it feels more dynamic and fresh. You have the same guns as the previous games, so there is nothing new about it. And Valve added new official scenarios and made more beautiful details to the older ones, such as Office and Dust2. But the best of this is (like in every Counter Strike), the custom games. There are many servers with Gun Game, Zombies mode, parkour, etc... A proof that the community of this game is alive.

Finally, the props and ragdolls can be used in GMod, which it's a proof of why you should buy this game.

Counter Strike Source might not have the stunning visuals and competitive mode of Global Offensive, or the fame 1.6 received, but this gem it's timeless, and trust me when I say this game is excellent even in 2022, even if game it's almost 20 years old.

CS起源可以说是半条命2的衍生作品（类似于半条命1与CS1.6的关系），在04年的时候可谓是独树一帜。由于在当时CSS过于吃配置，再加上不成熟的物体碰撞系统，导致推出后很长一段时间内职业比赛仍然以CS1.6为主。中间虽有推出CSPROMOD，但影响力不大，直到CSGO的出现，职业体系才有所转变。CS起源的手感接近于CS1.6，删除了盾牌，平衡性有所改观，地图美观度也有所提升。总的来说，想法很好，但实际效果一般，它最大的贡献在于为CSGO的流行打下了基础。
